content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. However, regarding the rental price discussion, let me ensure we secure the highest possible amount for my property. Please propose an initial figure so we can begin negotiations. Once we reach an agreement, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if satisfied, or 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]' if not. If we fail to reach a consensus, I'll indicate 'TERMINATE.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
